Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Prohibits qualified immunity for public officials
Summary: Prohibits qualified immunity for public officials; authorizes attorney general enforcement; provides that statutory immunities and statutory limitations on liability, damages or attorney fees do not apply to such claims.
LawCode: Amd ยง17, add ยง17-b, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting qualified immunity for elected public officials
